Welcome to clothing therapy!: You're probably wondering... what is clothing therapy?
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 你可能想知道……什麼是服裝療法？

Welcome to clothing therapy!: So many of us are struggling with personal issues... things holding us back from living how we want.
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 我們許多人都在與自身的問題做鬥爭……這些東西阻礙我們過我們想要的生活。

Welcome to clothing therapy!: It's important to me that everyone has a free and happy life... so I came up with a new kind of therapy to help people achieve that.
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 對我來說每個人都能擁有自由幸福的生活是很重要的……所以我提出一種新的療法來幫助大家。

Welcome to clothing therapy!: It's based on the amazing power of self-expression. Self-expression is a wonderful healing tool, did you know that?
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 它基於自我表達這一神奇力量。自我表達是一種奇妙的治療工具，你們知道嗎？

Welcome to clothing therapy!: Behind this curtain, you'll find racks and racks of clothes. There's endless options to choose from.
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 在這塊簾子後面，你會發現一貨架一貨架的衣服，有無盡的選擇。

Welcome to clothing therapy!: Your job is simple: find the outfit that truly speaks to you, and put it on.
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 你需要做的事情很簡單：找到適合你的衣服，然後穿上它。

Welcome to clothing therapy!: Feel confident in yourself and your choice. You all have a unique style to share with the world!
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 要對你自己和你的選擇有信心，分享給這個世界看屬於你們獨一無二的風格！

Welcome to clothing therapy!: Ah, @. You're just in time. Just observe and keep an open mind... okay?
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 啊，@。你來的剛好。只需要觀察和帶著好奇的心態……好嗎？

Welcome to clothing therapy!: Shane, it's a new side of you we've never known about. That's great!
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 謝恩，我們從來沒有看過你這一面，太棒了！

Welcome to clothing therapy!: Now, go outside with confidence and show the world!
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 現在走出去，自信點展示給這個世界看！
我們看看迪馬崔斯怎麼想……

Welcome to clothing therapy!: I just hope this experience helps everyone break out of their shells a bit.
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 我只希望這些經驗可以幫助每一個人突破他們的外形。

Welcome to clothing therapy!: I couldn't do it! I don't wanna break out of my shell!
歡迎來到服裝療法！: 我不會改的！我不想突破我的外形！

歡迎來到服裝療法！: ……哦。我……我想我打擾了你們，是嗎？
